snippet: An immigration judge’s ruling ordering the deportation of former Gen. Carlos Eugenio Vides Casanova over his role in the 1980 rape and murder of four American churchwomen and other crimes in El Salvador.
lead_paragraph: An immigration judge’s ruling ordering the deportation of former Gen. Carlos Eugenio Vides Casanova over his role in the 1980 rape and murder of four American churchwomen and other crimes in El Salvador.

headline.main: Judge’s Deportation Order on ex-Salvadoran General
